body: An addin for checking up EnergyPlus geometry's property details. [Tutorial link.](http://www.mpendesign.com/plugins/how-to-check-energyplus-objects-property-before-simulation/) Download: [EP_Property 0.2](http://www.mpendesign.com/plugins/ep_property-0-2-now-available/) [](http://i0.wp.com/www.mpendesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Capture-3.png?w=1630)[](http://i0.wp.com/www.mpendesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Capture-4.png?w=1480)
